content.html: I'd like to thank Twitter, in the aggregate, for answering two questions for me. 2007-2014: What if humanity had a single chatroom? 2014-?: What if the dumbest people on the planet were handed a microphone that nobody could shut off
content.value:
I'd like to thank Twitter, in the aggregate, for answering two questions for me.

2007-2014: What if humanity had a single chatroom?
2014-?: What if the dumbest people on the planet were handed a microphone that nobody could shut off
